com.versant.connector.common
Class DefaultConfigManager

java.lang.Object
  com.versant.connector.common.DefaultConfigManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConfigManager, java.io.Serializable
public class DefaultConfigManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements ConfigManager

DefaultConfigManager class provides a default implementation for ConfigManager interface which is independent of any application server. This implementation of ConfigManager interface can be used in the cases where JTA registration specific to any application server is not required.

See Also:
